voice.original_text: "This tool checks presentation slides against Amida's Style Guide."
voice.suggested_text: "Our tool ensures your presentation slides align with Amida's Style Guide."
voice.explanation: Rephrasing the sentence in active voice makes it more engaging and emphasizes the tool's purpose.

voice.original_text: "Element classification Active voice detection (spaCy) Positive language scoring (VADER) Tone issue identification"
voice.suggested_text: "We use advanced technologies like spaCy and VADER to classify elements, detect active voice, and score positive language, as well as identify tone issues."
voice.explanation: Breaking down technical terms into simpler language makes the text more accessible to a broader audience.

voice.original_text: "🚀 Process Document ✅ Successfully processed PDF with 37 slides/pages!"
voice.suggested_text: "The document processing was successful, and we've extracted 37 slides/pages from your PDF."
voice.explanation: Using more formal language and avoiding emojis in this context makes the text sound more professional.
Using clear and concise language makes the text easier to understand.

The original sentence is in passive voice, which can make the text seem less engaging. Changing it to active voice ("Tropical species have been improved") makes the text more dynamic and easier to read.

The use of a bullet point and the lack of a clear subject-verb-object structure make the text seem informal. Adding a clear subject-verb-object structure and removing the bullet point can help to create a more polished tone.
The term "species" is somewhat vague and could refer to either plants or animals. Adding "plant and animal" makes the text more specific and clear.
The text does not contain any gendered language or non-inclusive terms.
Amida Technology Solutions' style guide likely recommends using the full month name and four-digit year for dates. This change makes the text more readable and consistent with the style guide.

6.suggested_text: "Grammar, Style, and Formatting Guidelines for All Content"

The use of "enforcement" may imply a negative tone.

recommendations: Focus on active voice and positive language throughout the document
